mapper.select: SELECT dclz_no, emp_id, TO_CHAR(attend_date, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS attendDate, TO_CHAR(lvffc_date, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS lvffcDate, TO_CHAR(working_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS workingDay, extnd_working_hours, work_status, working_time FROM dclz_status WHERE emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY working_day
SELECT emp_id, TO_CHAR(attend_date, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS attendDate, TO_CHAR(lvffc_date, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS lvffcDate, working_time FROM dclz_status WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND working_day = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM( NVL(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(working_time, '^[0-9]+')), 0) + NVL(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(working_time, '[0-9]+$', 1, 1)), 0) / 60 ), 0) AS workingTime FROM dclz_status WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND working_day >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dclz_status (dclz_no, emp_id, attend_date, working_day, work_status, working_time) VALUES (SEQ_DCLZ.NEXTVAL, #{empId}, SYSDATE, TRUNC(SYSDATE), '출근', '0시간 00분')
mapper.update: UPDATE dclz_status SET lvffc_date = SYSDATE, work_status = '퇴근', working_time = TO_CHAR(TRUNC((SYSDATE - attend_date) * 24), 'FM999999') || '시간 ' || TO_CHAR(MOD((SYSDATE - attend_date) * 1440, 60), 'FM00') || '분' WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND working_day = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
